label: Dat TiddlyWiki
Description1: An experiment in creating peer-to-peer TiddlyWiki documents that can be updated from multiple devices and by multiple people
Description2: This is mostly an experiment using some cutting-edge peer-to-peer software libraries. I built it to scratch a personal itch. I use it myself to store personal notes and bits of information I'd like to share on multiple devices.
Participation URL: Fritter! dat://fritter.hashbase.io (in Beaker Browser) ... but I'm active on Twitter too... https://twitter.com/jimpick
Regional Traction: Mostly myself. I few people have tried it out.
description:
#Peer-to-Peer Tiddlywikis
##About Dat TiddlyWiki
![About Dat TiddlyWiki]()
 ###An experiment in creating peer-to-peer TiddlyWiki documents that can be updated from multiple devices and by multiple people
This is mostly an experiment using some cutting-edge peer-to-peer software libraries. I built it to scratch a personal itch. I use it myself to store personal notes and bits of information I'd like to share on multiple devices.
